Kim Jong Il receives big silk banner
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a big silk banner from the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) yesterday on the occasion of his birthday.
 And he received a floral basket from Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI.
